description: 1991 Pinatubo forcing and other forcings as used in the decadal prediction experiment DCPP dcppC-forecast-addPinatubo (was C3.4). Forcing input and implementation of the forcing to fully comply with the VolMIP protocol. To be initialised on 1st November 2015, or any other date in November or December for which initialised hindcasts are available (depending on the modelling centre). Run 10 ensemble members for 5 years.
keywords: VolMIP, Tier 3, Pinatubo, volcano, eruption, volcanic forcing
long_name: Pinatubo experiment for decadal climate prediction
rationale: To address the impact of volcanic forcing on seasonal and decadal climate predictability.  To address the climate implications of a future Pinatubo-like eruption.
